title: Are BTS live streaming on August 14 on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: No but on August 14th they’ll be appearing in I-LAND a reality show with Bang PD, pddog and other producers, choreographers that worked with BTS or other groups. If you wanna see it or watch it live and also keep up with BTS updates use this ARMY schedule. I’m sorry if your from a different country but use this and put it on your phone. BTS ARMY SCHEDULE — US BTS ARMY
